data.eml:eml: Review of the Australian wolf spider genus Ve n a t o r (Araneae, Lycosidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Framenau, Volker W. (2015): Review of the Australian wolf spider genus Ve n a t o r (Araneae, Lycosidae). Zootaxa 4013 (4): 541-555, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4013.4.5
